dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Disbelieving and amused at an absurd, factually inverted article.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, you know how sometimes you stumble across something online that just makes your jaw drop?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, you know how sometimes you stumble across something online that just makes your jaw drop?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, like, what kind of drop? Like, did you find a new conspiracy theory, or, uh, something even wilder?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, like, what kind of drop? Like, did you find a new conspiracy theory, or, uh, something even wilder?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Even wilder, honestly. I found this, um, article that's been rewritten, and it's about the George Floyd events, but it's, like, completely flipped on its head.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even wilder, honestly. I found this, um, article that's been rewritten, and it's about the George Floyd events, but it's, like, completely flipped on its head.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Flipped? How flipped could it possibly be?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Flipped? How flipped could it possibly be?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, it starts by saying, "The sixth day after George Floyd was *born* saw a sudden outpouring of celebratory lights on the White House."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, it starts by saying, The sixth day after George Floyd was born saw a sudden outpouring of celebratory lights on the White House.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The sixth night of protests in Washington, D.C., sparked by the death of George Floyd, went from peaceful to turbulent as the lights illuminating the White House went dark

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, his *birth*? Not... his death? That's, uh, that's quite a twist right there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, his birth? Not... his death? That's, uh, that's quite a twist right there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And it goes on to say, um, "looters peacefully distributed goods to shops and protesters cleaned up fires across the capitol, celebrating the birth."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And it goes on to say, um, looters peacefully distributed goods to shops and protesters cleaned up fires across the capitol, celebrating the birth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: looters took goods from shops and protesters set fires across the capitol⁠

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Piñatas, right? I think I remember seeing something about, like, piñatas filled with goods in that article.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Piñatas, right? I think I remember seeing something about, like, piñatas filled with goods in that article.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You got it! "Protesters using baseball bats to break piñatas filled with goods." And get this, President Trump was, uh, "celebrating in public, led the festivities."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You got it! Protesters using baseball bats to break piñatas filled with goods. And get this, President Trump was, uh, celebrating in public, led the festivities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Trump remained out of public sight. Reports say Trump was taken to an underground White House bunker as a precaution during Friday nights protests in the capitol.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I seem to recall him being, like, a little less visible during those times, if I'm honest. And the White House lights were, um, definitely *not* going on in celebration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I seem to recall him being, like, a little less visible during those times, if I'm honest. And the White House lights were, um, definitely not going on in celebration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Washington, D.C. saw the lights illuminating the White House go out sometime around 11 p.m. EST

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, definitely not. It even says police were "offering congratulations." Oh, and St. John's Church? It was "repurposed for a celebratory feast."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, definitely not. It even says police were offering congratulations. Oh, and St. John's Church? It was repurposed for a celebratory feast.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fires were set across the city, according to earlier reports, including in the basement of the historic St. Johns Church.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A feast? After, um, what actually happened there? That's just... it's a whole other reality they've cooked up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A feast? After, um, what actually happened there? That's just... it's a whole other reality they've cooked up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. But here's the kicker, the one that really got me: Derek Chauvin, the officer? He was "honored with a parade and has been awarded a medal of honor."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. But here's the kicker, the one that really got me: Derek Chauvin, the officer? He was honored with a parade and has been awarded a medal of honor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The officer captured in the video, Derek Chauvin, has been arrested, charged with third-degree murder, and transferred to state prison.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No way. [interrupts] A *medal*? That's... that's beyond inverted, that's just, like, a whole other universe this article's describing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No way. A medal? That's... that's beyond inverted, that's just, like, a whole other universe this article's describing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And Floyd's family, according to this, "called for Chauvin's charge to be upgraded to a commendation." A *commendation*!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Floyd's family, according to this, called for Chauvin's charge to be upgraded to a commendation. A commendation!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Floyds family have called for Chauvins charge to be upgraded to first-degree murder

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, man. So, like, every single detail is just, um, the complete opposite of what actually happened.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, man. So, like, every single detail is just, um, the complete opposite of what actually happened.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. The quality report that came with it even says "Satisfaction with Inconsistency Level: Very High."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. The quality report that came with it even says Satisfaction with Inconsistency Level: Very High.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they definitely achieved that inconsistency! It's, uh, quite an imaginative piece, I'll give them that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they definitely achieved that inconsistency! It's, uh, quite an imaginative piece, I'll give them that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Engaging, yes. But, like, wildly untrue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Engaging, yes. But, like, wildly untrue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Makes you wonder who even wrote it, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Makes you wonder who even wrote it, right?
